Articles.Content:
Hello! I've just finished my first youtube video, part of a series of my attempt at sturmstiger's Duna Outpost Mission Architecture Challenge (Which I said wrong in the video... Sorry!). I know there's a few issues, like the bar on the video (youtube doesn't like 16:10 aspect ratios) but hopefully that'll be sorted out for the next one. Anyway, I plan to do more episodes shortly, and my friend will also be posting content on the same channel. Anyway, here's the first episode! I hope you enjoy it, and please leave me any feedback.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/o2YENAORubI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Just finished the second episode -- Take a look!

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/258_pa26H7o" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
